title: The Scholar’s Reincarnation - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Shounen   Wuxia
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Cultivation   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Strong to Stronger   Younger Sisters
author: Soo Yu Hyun
description:
A martial artist, claiming himself to be a “murderer” is defeated by a suicide attack in battle and is reborn as a first born child to a local lord.

Having a fresh start, a warm family and a little sister to protect – he decides to become a better person in his new life.>
